# Logisim PLA program table
00000011 1011 # rr
00010011 1100 # rrc
00100011 1101 # rl
00110011 1110 # rlc
0000x1xx 0000 # inc
0001x1xx 0001 # dec
0010x1xx 0010 # add
0011x1xx 0011 # addc
0100xx10 0111 # orl
0101xx1x 1000 # anl
1001x1xx 0100 # subb
11011xxx 1010 # compare (djnz)
10000100 0110 # div
10100100 0101 # mul
0110xx1x 1001 # xrl
